snippet: About 20 percent of hospital patients over 65 experience delirium-related complications, but with proper management episodes can be shortened and costs reduced.
abstract: About 20 percent of hospital patients over 65 experience delirium-related complications, but with proper management episodes can be shortened and costs reduced.

headline.main: Vigilance About the Dangers of Delirium
